data.text: @RuralMHMatters Oh no Melanie life is throwing it all at you. Sending more gentle K hugs
@BipolarBlogger Don't worry, nothing to apologise for! I doubt I read everyone's either 😁😊💚
@RuralMHMatters Oh I don't think I looked at your profile before, sorry!

@BipolarBlogger It's in my profile, but as this is my Social Enterprise account, I keep it as Rural Mental Health Matters. I can't run 2 accounts... So focus on this one 👍💚. As founder of RMHM I am always trying to highlight #ruralmentalhealth & #mentalhealth issues. It's not always sad tho!
@CarolinaMountfo Thank you. Yes it's pretty much stress city in our family at the moment. 😩 Solidarity with anyone else who is going through this. Melanie 💚
@RuralMHMatters Ah, it's nice to know your name :)
@RuralMHMatters Oh RHMH I'm so sorry to hear this, you're family really needs to catch a break. Here's hoping your daughter's breast lump is benign.
@RuralMHMatters Oh my goodness I'm so sorry 😭
